name: Comets Game (Beta)
description:
Comets Game (Beta)

*updated version* (beta)

I've added a menu screen to start the game, and powerups for the player to collect!

Also I designed the powerup with gimp 2.10.30.

NEW MAIN GOAL: theres a special comet that drops powerups find it and collect 3 poweups to complete the game...

*game description* (alpha)

I designed the pastel purple space background (for the map), the space jet (the player), the sakura bullet (the player uses to destroy the comets), the heart angel death (the death of the comets), and the comets (that will attack the player) with gimp 2.10.30, I made sure the pixel size were the same as the tutorial 1 (top-down shooter)'s pixel size.

I designed this game with the knowledge of tutorial 1 (top-down shooter). I wanted to make it simple and the same theme as my solo tabletop game called Comets. 

credits to: https://www.construct.net/en/tutorials/beginners-guide-construct-1

To Start the Game, Please Use Full Screen Mode. (Located bottom right of the game)!

Goal of the game: don't get hit by the comets, stay alive and try to avoid the comets from hitting you! release your sakura blast to destroy the comets!

Controls: use Arrow Keys on your keyboard to move across the space map and use your Mouse to move the direction you want to release your sakura blast!

Hope you enjoy my comets game (alpha), thanks for playing!
